mapper.insert:
select oid_seq.nextval from dual
insert into orders (oid, oamount, oaddress, odate, ototal, users_uaid) values (#{oid},#{oamount},#{oaddress},sysdate,#{ototal},#{users_uaid})
insert into ORDER_ITEMS (OTID, OTPRICE, OTCOUNT,ORDERS_OID,OTDISCOUNT) values (ORDER_ITEMS_OTID_SEQ.nextval,#{otprice},#{otcount},#{ordersOid},#{otdiscount})
mapper.select: select count(*) from users u, orders o, order_items ot, cart_items ct where o.users_uaid = u.uaid and ot.orders_oid = o.oid and ct.order_items_otid = ot.otid and ct.books_isbn = #{bookIsbn} and u.uaid = #{sessionUaid}
